Description: Small squat jar of marl pottery with flat base, high shoulder, low neck and rolled rim, decorated in red-brown paint with six vertical bands composed of sets of four dashes or wavy lines applied with a multiple brush.
Curator's comments: Decoration like Decorated ware D26 series in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921).
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
